title: T206 Thornton SL for trade.  Additional cards I am looking for.
author: t206wagner

posts.post_title: T206 Thornton SL for trade.  Additional cards I am looking for.
posts.post_content:
I am looking to trade my T206 Thornton for a similar condition card of a Southern Leaguer that I need.  The cards that I still need are:

Fritz
Guilheen
Howard
Kiernan
Perdue
Reagan
Revelle
Seitz
Thebo

posts.post_title: T206 Thornton SL for trade.  Additional cards I am looking for.
